resources.string:
Location : Salna, Gazipur
Total Area : 187 acres
Establishment : 22 November, 1998
Faculty : 5
Departments : 36

Agricultural Engineering, Agro-Processing, Anatomy and Histology, Animal Breeding and Genetics, Animal Science and Nutrition, Aquaculture, Bio- Technology, Dairy and Poultry Science, Environmental Science, Fisheries Biology and Aquatic Environment, Fisheries Management, Fisheries Technology, Genetics and Fish Breeding, Gynecology Obstratics and Reproductive Health and Patho-Biology.

Agricultural Extension and Rural Development, Agroforestry and Environment, Agronomy, Agricultural Engineering, Agro-processing, Bio-Chemistry and Molecular Biology, Bio-Technology, Computer Science and Information Technology, Crop Botany, Environmental Science, Entomology, Genetics and Plant Breeding, Horticulture, Plant Pathology, Soil Science, Seed Science and Technology Unit.
Aquaculture, Fisheries Biology and Aquatic Environment, Fisheries Management, Fisheries Technology, Genetics and Fish Breeding.

Animal Breeding and Genetics, Animal Science and Nutrition, Dairy and Poultry Science, Gynecology, Obstratics and Reproductive Health, Medicine, Micro-biology and Public Health, Patho-Biology, Physiology and Pharmacology, Surgery and Radiology.
Agricultural Economics, Agricultural Finance and Cooperatives, Agribusiness, Rural Development, Statistics.

To serve as a “Center of Excellence” for agricultural education leading to BS, MS and PhD degrees.
To provide an education consistent with international standards through well designed academic programmers.
To conduct basic and applied research to generate appropriate and sustainable technologies in the different fields of agriculture.
To disseminate and transfer generated technologies to the end users through training and outreach activities
To provide policy support focusing on local and national issues within the national agricultural research framework with emphasis on food and nutrition securities of the country.
